pr_title: TSK-1155: Claiming a task and cancelling a claim works in UI/workplace

timeline.message: TSK-1155: Claiming a task and cancelling a claim works in UI/workplace

timeline.author: Tristan2357

replies.bodyText: yes, it is used to go back to the task details after cancelling a claim, completing a task or transferring a task.
replies.author: sofie29
